quotes.quote: We do not inherit the earth from our ancestors, we borrow it from our children.
The earth is what we all have in common.
Those who contemplate the beauty of the Earth find reserves of strength that will endure as long as life lasts.
Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's need, but not every man's greed.
The Earth has a skin and that skin has diseases, one of its diseases is called man.
There are no passengers on Spaceship Earth. We are all crew.
Man must feel the earth to know himself and recognize his values . God made life simple. It is man who complicates it.
The best investment on earth is earth.
Everything costs and costs the earth.
The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens.
Touch the earth, feel the earth, her plains, her valleys, her hills, and her seas; rest your spirit in her solitary places.
The earth has grown a nervous system, and it's us.
The earth is the general and equal possession of all humanity and therefore cannot be the property of individuals.
I really wonder what gives us the right to wreck this poor planet of ours.
The materials of wealth are in the earth, in the seas, and in their natural and unaided productions.
... do something. Pay your rent for the privilege of living on this beautiful, blue-green, living Earth.

The Earth is the only world known so far to harbor life. There is nowhere else, at least in the near future, to which our species could migrate. Visit, yes. Settle, not yet. Like it or not, for the moment the Earth is where we make our stand.
The Earth does not belong to us: we belong to the Earth.
If we do not permit the earth to produce beauty and joy, it will in the end not produce food, either.
The earth belongs to the living, not to the dead.
Lower your expectations of earth. This isn't heaven, so don't expect it to be.
The earth will not continue to offer its harvest, except with faithful stewardship. We cannot say we love the land and then take steps to destroy it for use by future generations.
Mankind without Earth is Humanity without a Home
The threat to the planet is us. It's actually not a threat to the planet - it's a threat to us.
The Earth is the cradle of humanity, but mankind cannot stay in the cradle forever.
For the earth is the Lord's and the fulness thereof.
If you tickle the earth with a hoe she laughs with a harvest.
The earth is the very quintessence of the human condition.
...the care of the earth is our most ancient and most worthy and, after all, our most pleasing responsibility. To cherish what remains of it, and to foster its renewal, is our only legitimate hope.
Do no dishonour to the earth least you dishonour the spirit of man.
Earth is a small town with many neighborhoods in a very big universe.
You must love the crust of the earth on which you dwell more than the sweet crust of any bread or cake; you must be able to extract nutriment out of a sand heap.
ON EARTH, WE STILL HAVE A BEAUTIFUL ATMOSPHERE THAT PRECISELY MAINTAINS A THERMALLY DRIVEN CLIMATIC SYSTEM THAT SHELTERS, SHIELDS AND SUSTAINS OUR NATURAL TREASURES.
The greatest threat to our planet is the belief that someone else will save it.
A nation that destroys its soil destroys itself.
It is absurd to think that we can bring life on a dead planet like Mars, if we cannot sustain it on a planet steaming with life like EARTH!
It used to be said that Pluto is a misfit. But now we know Earth is the misfit. This is the most populous class of planet in our solar system and we have never sent a mission to this class.
Take care of the earth and she will take care of you.
We are living on the planet as if we have another one to go to.
How inappropriate to call this planet Earth when it is quite clearly Ocean.
This land, this water, this air, this planet - this is our legacy to our young.
The Earth is the most powerful and energetic planet.
In every curving beach, in every grain of sand, there is the story of the earth.
I am the Earth. You are the Earth. The Earth is dying. You and I are murderers.
What befalls the Earth, befalls all the sons and daugter's of the Earth.
And forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair.
Orbiting earth in the spaceship, I saw how beautiful our planet is. People, let us preserve and increase this beauty, not destroy it!
The earth laughs in flowers.
Mars is too cold, Venus is too hot, earth is just right.
Here we are, the most clever species ever to have lived. So how is it we can destroy the only planet we have?
Sow a seed and the earth will yield you a flower. Dream your dream to the sky and it will bring you your beloved.
We are pilgrims, not settlers, this earth is our inn, not our home.
Opinion has caused more trouble on this little earth than plagues or earthquakes.
Heaven on Earth is a choice you must make, not a place you must find.
Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
What makes earth feel like hell is our expectation that it should feel like heaven.
In every outthrust headland, in every curving beach, in every grain of sand there is a story of the earth.

It suddenly struck me that that tiny pea, pretty and blue, was the Earth. I put up my thumb and shut one eye, and my thumb blotted out the planet Earth. I didn't feel like a giant. I felt very, very small.
The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
The earth is like a spaceship that didn't come with an operating manual.
There is no security on this earth, there is only opportunity.
Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
There are more things in Heaven and Earth, Horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy.
The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
Government of the people, by the people, for the people, shall not perish from the Earth.
Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
I left Earth three times and found no other place to go. Please take care of Spaceship Earth.
This goodly frame, the earth, seems to me a sterile promontory.
The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights.
The divine is not something high above us. It is in heaven, it is in earth, it is inside us.
We came all this way to explore the Moon, and the most important thing is that we discovered the Earth.
No occupation is so delightful to me as the culture of the earth, and no culture comparable to that of the garden.
The earth is like a beautiful bride who needs no manmade jewels to heighten her loveliness.
The earth we abuse and the living things we kill will, in the end, take their revenge, for in exploiting their presence we are diminishing our future.
The surface of the Earth is the shore of the cosmic ocean.
God owns heaven but He craves the earth.
When the Earth is sick, the animals will begin to disappear, when that happens, The Warriors of the Rainbow will come to save them.
Everything on the earth has a purpose, every disease an herb to cure it, and every person a mission. This is the Indian theory of existence.
The earth is the Lord's fullness thereof: this is no longer a hollow dictum of religion, but a directive for economic action toward human brotherhood.
The earth is mankind's ultimate haven, our blessed terra firm. When it trembles and gives way beneath our feet, it's as though one of God's checks has bounced.
One does not sell the earth upon which the people walk.
This planet below you is our campsite, and you know of no other campground.
It is only a little planet, but how beautiful it is.
